original_text: And, behold, there was a man named Zacchaeus, which was the chief among the publicans, and he was rich.
korean_text: 삭개오라 이름하는 자가 있으니 세리장이요 또한 부자라

sentences.original_text: And, behold, there was a man named Zacchaeus
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 보라, 삭개오라는 한 사람이 있었고

sentences.original_text: which was the chief among the publicans
